languages.text: {n}Вокруг руин Сципионы 84-249 были разбиты обширные трудовые лагеря, куда согнали беженцев из пустошей и соседних ульев. В суровых пустошах, выжженных промышленным ядом, с минимумом еды и чистой воды обитатели лагерей принялись за тяжелую и опасную работу — восстановление павшего дома.{/n}

{n}Large labour settlements were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, and the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives have been rounded up there. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents have begun the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вокруг руин Сципионы 84-249 были разбиты обширные трудовые лагеря, куда согнали беженцев из пустошей и соседних ульев. В суровых пустошах, выжженных промышленным ядом, с минимумом еды и чистой воды обитатели лагерей принялись за тяжелую и опасную работу — восстановление павшего дома.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The large labour camps were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, rounding up the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare minimum of food and clean water supply, the camp residents began the hard and dangerous work of rebuilding the fallen house.{/n}

In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents began the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}

languages.text: {n}希皮奥内84-249的废墟周围建立起了大量的劳工定居点，所有来自废土与邻近巢都难民的被聚集在那里。废土上充满了工业毒物，只有少量食物和净水，居民们开始重建他们倒塌的家园。这注定会是艰巨而危险的任务。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Large labour settlements were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, and the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives have been rounded up there. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents have begun the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}希皮奥内84-249的废墟周围建立起了大量的劳工定居点，所有来自废土与邻近巢都难民的被聚集在那里。废土上充满了工业毒物，只有少量食物和净水，居民们开始重建他们倒塌的家园。这注定会是艰巨而危险的任务。{/n}
{n}希皮奥内84-249的废墟周围建立起了大量的劳工定居点，所有来自废土与邻近巢都难民的被聚集在那里。废土上充满了工业毒物，只有少量食物和净水，居民们开始重建他们倒塌的家园。这注定会是艰巨而危险的任务。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Grandes asentamientos de trabajadores se establecieron alrededor de las ruinas de Escipión 84-249, donde se reunió a los refugiados de los páramos y las colmenas vecinas. En los duros páramos abrasados por el veneno industrial, con un mínimo de comida y agua limpia, los residentes de los asentamientos han comenzado la ardua y peligrosa tarea de reconstruir su hogar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Large labour settlements were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, and the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives have been rounded up there. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents have begun the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Grandes asentamientos de trabajadores se establecieron alrededor de las ruinas de Escipión 84-249, donde se reunió a los refugiados de los páramos y las colmenas vecinas. En los duros páramos abrasados por el veneno industrial, con un mínimo de comida y agua limpia, los residentes de los asentamientos han comenzado la ardua y peligrosa tarea de reconstruir su hogar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイピオーネ84-249の廃墟周辺には大規模な労働者居住区が設けられ、ウエストランドや近隣のハイヴからの難民を収容した。産業毒で焦土と化した過酷なウエストランドで、わずかな食料ときれいな水だけを手にした居住区の住人たちは、倒壊した家を再建するという困難で危険な作業に取りかかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Large labour settlements were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, and the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives have been rounded up there. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents have begun the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイピオーネ84-249の廃墟周辺には大規模な労働者居住区が設けられ、ウエストランドや近隣のハイヴからの難民を収容した。産業毒で焦土と化した過酷なウエストランドで、わずかな食料ときれいな水だけを手にした居住区の住人たちは、倒壊した家を再建するという困難で危険な作業に取りかかった。{/n}
{n}サイピオーネ84-249の廃墟周辺には大規模な労働者居住区が設けられ、ウエストランドや近隣のハイヴからの難民を収容した。産業毒で焦土と化した過酷なウエストランドで、わずかな食料ときれいな水だけを手にした居住区の住人たちは、倒壊した家を再建するという困難で危険な作業に取りかかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'imposants sites ouvriers sont établis autour des ruines de Scipione 84-249 pour accueillir les réfugiés des terres désolées et des ruches avoisinantes. Dans les territoires brûlés de poisons industriels et ne disposant que d'un minimum de nourriture et d'eau potable, les habitants des sites commencèrent un travail harassant et dangereux : celui de rebâtir leurs foyers perdus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Large labour settlements were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, and the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives have been rounded up there. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents have begun the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'imposants sites ouvriers sont établis autour des ruines de Scipione 84-249 pour accueillir les réfugiés des terres désolées et des ruches avoisinantes. Dans les territoires brûlés de poisons industriels et ne disposant que d'un minimum de nourriture et d'eau potable, les habitants des sites commencèrent un travail harassant et dangereux : celui de rebâtir leurs foyers perdus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Große Arbeitssiedlungen wurden rund um die Ruinen von Scipione 84-249 errichtet, und die Flüchtlinge aus dem Ödland und den benachbarten Makropolwelten wurde dort zusammengetrieben. Im rauen Ödland, vom industriellen Gift verbrannt, stand den Flüchtlingen nur ein Minimum an Nahrung und sauberem Wasser zur Verfügung. Sie machten sich an die beschwerliche und gefährliche Aufgabe, ihre zerstörte Heimat wiederaufzubauen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Large labour settlements were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, and the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives have been rounded up there. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents have begun the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}

Im rauen Ödland, vom industriellen Gift verbrannt, stand den Flüchtlingen nur ein Minimum an Nahrung und sauberem Wasser zur Verfügung. {n}Große Arbeitssiedlungen wurden rund um die Ruinen von Scipione 84-249 errichtet, und die Flüchtlinge aus dem Ödland und den benachbarten Makropolwelten wurde zusammengetrieben. Im rauen Ödland, vom industriellen Gift verbrannt, stand den Flüchtlingen nur ein Minimum an Nahrung und sauberem Wasser zur Verfügung. Sie machten sich an die beschwerliche und gefährliche Aufgabe, einen Ersatz für ihre zerstörte Heimat aufzubauen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Scipione 84-249 harabeleri civarına büyük işçi yerleşim yerleri kuruldu. Buralarda çorak topraklardan ve komşu kovanlardan gelen mülteciler toplandı. Yalnızca az bir miktarda yiyecek ve temiz su bulunan, sınai zehirle yanıp kül olmuş bu acımasız çorak topraklardaki yerleşim yeri sakinleri, meşakkatli ve tehlikeli bir görev üstlenerek yerle bir olmuş yuvalarını yeniden inşa etmeye girişti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Large labour settlements were set up around the ruins of Scipione 84-249, and the refugees from the wastelands and neighbouring hives have been rounded up there. In the harsh wastelands scorched with industrial poison, with only a bare modicum of food and clean water, the settlement residents have begun the arduous and dangerous task of rebuilding their fallen home.{/n}
